doc.p1: Doks API is really easy to use, the API is composed of a single powerfull method search.
doc.p2: The method only take two parameters : q and language.
doc.p3: Doks API can be use in client-side using JSONP by passing an argument callback.
doc.p4: Source code for the api server is avaiable on GitHub : FriendCode/doks-server
